# `DataIngestionRuleCriteria` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| effectivePlatform | `string` | Yes | The effective platform for the data ingestion rule. |
| id | `string` | Yes | The ID of the data ingestion rule. |
| name | `string` | No | The name of the data ingestion rule. Only populated when expanded. |
